Reviews.Title: camera review
Reviews.Author: Margaret Dowling "travel and sew"
Reviews.Content: Camera is compact, easy to use and uses card.  Great for teenager or handy to keep in car or handbag as second camera for those don't want to miss shots.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera!!
Reviews.Author: Paul Lin
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera.  The picture effect is very interesting and fun.  The only downside is battery life.  It won't last over a week.  =(

Reviews.Title: doesn't work on a Mac
Reviews.Author: E. Kelly "a Christian"
Reviews.Content: It would have been nice if amazon would have said that the drivers and software, which are NEEDED, were only for windows...  i can't find a mac driver anywhere and wouldn't know where to put it anyway

Reviews.Title: I had questions, e-mailed the company with them.. that was a week ago.
Reviews.Author: Dad of 3 "I hope my opinion helps you.."
Reviews.Content: I never recieved a reply from the company. They can't bother to answer my few simple questions, i don't buy their product.
